member.name: T:Enemies.Zombie
member.summary: This class creates a Zombie and sets its health to 0.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs new zombie with health of 0

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets value of health. If value is less than 0, an error is thrown.

member.name: P:Enemies.Zombie.Name
member.summary: Gets and sets the value of private field name
